chapters.title: Chapter 17:  Secrets
chapters.info:
Salita Toranes,
      p. 425 (513)—Dark-skinned Sitter for the Yellow Ajah among the rebel Aes
      Sedai.  She is from Tear, has a round face, and is almost as dark as the
      Sea Folk.  She was raised to a Sitter after the sisters banded together
      in Salidar.  She suggested a tax on the towns the Aes Sedai passed
      through to raise money for the ever-growing army.  She has been an Aes
      Sedai only 35 years, which is too young to be a sitter—most
      sisters have worn the shawl over 100 years by the time they become
      Sitters.  She thinks it is wrong to sell objects made from
      cuendillar that they have just made recently.
      She also thinks the Yellows are being unfairly drawn from Healing to
      make the objects (as if her Ajah's duty was more important than that of
      other Ajahs).
